KnowWE-helper

Some helper functions used in the javascript files in KnowWE.  Was separated from the core KnowWE javascript functions for easier reuse and clarity.

Summary
KnowWE-helperSome helper functions used in the javascript files in KnowWE.
KNOWWE.helperSome helper functions packed in the KNOWWE.helper namespace.
Functions
enrichEnriches an object by replacing its key:value pairs with those from an other object.
getXMouseReturns to a given event the current x position in the browser window.
getYMouseReturns to a given event the current y position in the browser window.
findXYReturns the distance from the top left corner of the document of a DOM element.
gupReturns the value of a URL parameter.
loadCheckChecks if the current page allows certain onload events.
KNOWWE.helper.eventThe KNOWWE event namespace.
Functions
addAdds an event to an object.
removeRemoves an event from an object.
removeEventsRemoves all events from an object.
targetReturns the element which throw the event.
KNOWWE.helper.ajaxThis class is used to handle AJAX request in KNOWWE.
Functions
initInitializes the some KNOWWE.ajax things
handleResponseHandles the response from the AJAX request.
sendSends the AJAX request.
getResponseReturns the text of the AJAX response.
KNOWWE.helper.elementThe KNOWWE element namespace.
Functions
_clearClears the innerHTML of the current element.
_cssSets the given CSS properties to the current element.
_nextReturns the next element on the same level as the current element.
_previousReturns the previous element on the same level as the current element.
_getChildrenReturns the children of the current element.
_getParentReturns the parent node of the current DOM element.
_getStyleReturns the style attribute of the current element.
_setStyleSets the style attribute of the current element.
_setTextSets the text of the current DOM element.
_setHTMLSets the innerHTML of the current element.
_setPropertiesid, class, href, src, title.
_removeRemoves the current DOM element from the DOM.
_hideLets you hide the current DOM element.
_showLets you show the current DOM element.
_hasClassChecks if the current element has a given class set.
_addClassAdd the given class to the current element
_attrReturns an attribute of an DOM element.
_injectAdds the current element as a child of a given element.
_injectTopAdds the current element before the given element.
_injectBeforeAdds the current element before the parent node of the current DOM element into the DOM.
_injectAfterAdds the current element after the parent node of the current DOM element into the DOM.
KNOWWE.helper.selectorSelects and extends DOM elements.
KNOWWE.helper.hashRepresentation of a map.
Functions
setAdds a key:value pair to the map.
containsChecks if the a value is already stored in the map.
getGets an value to the given key.
forEachApplies an function to every single element in the map.
keysReturns the keys of the current map.
sizeReturns the size of the map
removeRemoves an value from the map
toStringReturns an string containing all elements of the map aks key:value pair.

Variables
inUseSet to false if you want that the logger does not appear.

Functions
setupInitializes the logger if it has not yet.
clearClears the logger messages.
errorLogs the given message to the overlay HTMLNode DIV container as a debug message.
infoLogs the given message to the overlay HTMLNode DIV container as a debug message.
KNOWWE.helper.overlayThe overlay namespace.
Variables
oDefaultContains the default options of the dialog.
Functions
initInitializes the overlay.
KNOWWE.helper.windowThe KNOWWE window object.
Functions
openShows a pop-up window with the given parameter.
getWindowReturns the current window.
String.getBytesEncodes this String into a sequence of bytes, storing the result into a new string encoded as a component of a URI.
String.startsWithDetermines whether the beginning of an instance of String matches a specified string.
String.endsWithDetermines whether the end of an instance of String matches a specified string..
String.eachIterates over an array and executes the given function for each element of the array.

KNOWWE.helper

Some helper functions packed in the KNOWWE.helper namespace.  This was separated from the main KNOWWE due clarity.

Summary
Functions
enrichEnriches an object by replacing its key:value pairs with those from an other object.
getXMouseReturns to a given event the current x position in the browser window.
getYMouseReturns to a given event the current y position in the browser window.
findXYReturns the distance from the top left corner of the document of a DOM element.
gupReturns the value of a URL parameter.
loadCheckChecks if the current page allows certain onload events.

Functions

enrich

enrich : function (oNew,
oDefault)

Enriches an object by replacing its key:value pairs with those from an other object.  Also non existing key:value pairs from the first object are added.  Key:value pairs that occur not in the oNew object are not changed in the oDefault object.

Parameters

oNewThe array with new or additional key:value pairs.
oDefaultThe array with the default key:value pairs.

Returns

The enriched array.

getXMouse

getXMouse : function(e)

Returns to a given event the current x position in the browser window.

Parameters

eThe occurred event.

Returns

The mouseX position

getYMouse

getYMouse : function(e)

Returns to a given event the current y position in the browser window.

Parameters

eThe occurred event.

Returns

The mouseY position

findXY

findXY : function(obj)

Returns the distance from the top left corner of the document of a DOM element.  Inspired by Peter-Paul Koch

Parameters

objThe DOM element one wants to know the distance.

Returns

The x and y value of the distance.

gup

gup : function(name)

Returns the value of a URL parameter.  Which parameter is specified through the {@link name} parameter.

../Wiki.jsp?page=KnowWE-ExamplePage :
    KNOWWE.util.gup( 'page' ) --> KnowWE-Example-Page

Parameters

nameThe parameter to search for in the URL

Returns

The found URL parameter value.

loadCheck

loadCheck : function(pages)

Checks if the current page allows certain onload events.  If the pages parameter contains the current page, the onload event is triggered, otherwise none.  Prevents errors due incorrect context for onload events.

Parameters

pagesA list of pages that should be checked.

Returns

The result of the check.

KNOWWE.helper.event

The KNOWWE event namespace.  Used to add and remove events to certain DOM elements.  This is based on the mootools framework and simply wraps the event functions.

Summary
Functions
addAdds an event to an object.
removeRemoves an event from an object.
removeEventsRemoves all events from an object.
targetReturns the element which throw the event.

Functions

add

add : function(eventType,
object,
handler)

Adds an event to an object.  If the eventType occurs the given function is executed.

Parameters

eventTypeThe type of the event e.g. click, mouseout, ...
objectThe DomElement to which the event should be bind
handlerThe function that should be executed on the event

remove

remove : function(eventType,
object,
handler)

Removes an event from an object.

Parameters

eventTypeThe type of the event e.g. click, mouseout, ...
objectThe DomElement to which the event should be bind
handlerThe function that should be executed on the event

removeEvents

removeEvents : function(eventType,
object)

Removes all events from an object.

Parameters

eventTypeThe type of the event e.g. click, mouseout, ...
objectThe DomElement to which the event should be bind

target

target : function(e)

Returns the element which throw the event.

Parameters

eThe occurred event.

Returns

The element which triggered the element.

KNOWWE.helper.ajax

This class is used to handle AJAX request in KNOWWE.  For possible content of the options object please read the comments in the source code.

Parameters

optionsThe options for the request.
Summary
Functions
initInitializes the some KNOWWE.ajax things
handleResponseHandles the response from the AJAX request.
sendSends the AJAX request.
getResponseReturns the text of the AJAX response.

Functions

init

function init()

Initializes the some KNOWWE.ajax things

handleResponse

function handleResponse()

Handles the response from the AJAX request.  If the AJAX request ended without errors the action defined in oDefault.response.action is executed.

send

this.send = function()

Sends the AJAX request.  Also specifies what to to after the response got back.

getResponse

this.getResponse = function()

Returns the text of the AJAX response.

Returns

Result of the response.

KNOWWE.helper.element

The KNOWWE element namespace.  Custom Native to allow all of its methods to be used with any extended DOM Element.

Parameters

tagThe tag of the element.
propertiesThe properties of the element

Returns

A DOM element enriched with some methods

Summary
Functions
_clearClears the innerHTML of the current element.
_cssSets the given CSS properties to the current element.
_nextReturns the next element on the same level as the current element.
_previousReturns the previous element on the same level as the current element.
_getChildrenReturns the children of the current element.
_getParentReturns the parent node of the current DOM element.
_getStyleReturns the style attribute of the current element.
_setStyleSets the style attribute of the current element.
_setTextSets the text of the current DOM element.
_setHTMLSets the innerHTML of the current element.
_setPropertiesid, class, href, src, title.
_removeRemoves the current DOM element from the DOM.
_hideLets you hide the current DOM element.
_showLets you show the current DOM element.
_hasClassChecks if the current element has a given class set.
_addClassAdd the given class to the current element
_attrReturns an attribute of an DOM element.
_injectAdds the current element as a child of a given element.
_injectTopAdds the current element before the given element.
_injectBeforeAdds the current element before the parent node of the current DOM element into the DOM.
_injectAfterAdds the current element after the parent node of the current DOM element into the DOM.

Functions

_clear

_clear : function()

Clears the innerHTML of the current element.

_css

_css : function(properties)

Sets the given CSS properties to the current element.  The properties should be given as an object.

Parameters

propertiesThe CSS properties to be applied to the element.

_next

_next : function()

Returns the next element on the same level as the current element.  The elements are therefore neighbours.

Returns

The next DOM element.

_previous

_previous : function()

Returns the previous element on the same level as the current element.  The elements are therefore neighbours.

Returns

The previous DOM element.

_getChildren

_getChildren : function()

Returns the children of the current element.

Returns

The children of the current DOM element.

_getParent

_getParent : function(clazz)

Returns the parent node of the current DOM element.

Returns

Parent node of the current element.

_getStyle

_getStyle : function(attr)

Returns the style attribute of the current element.

Parameters

attrThe style attribute of the element one wants to have.

Returns

The specified style attribute of the element.

_setStyle

_setStyle : function(attr ,
 value)

Sets the style attribute of the current element.

Parameters

attrThe style attribute of the element one wants to set.

_setText

_setText : function(text)

Sets the text of the current DOM element.

Parameters

textThe text string.

_setHTML

_setHTML : function(html)

Sets the innerHTML of the current element.

Parameters

attrThe style attribute of the element one wants to set.

_setProperties

_setProperties : function(properties ,
 elem)

Allows you to set certain properties of an DOM element.  Such properties can be

id, class, href, src, title.  Also all attribute that are allowed for the DOM element.

Parameters

propertiesThe style attribute of the element one wants to set.
elemThe element the properties should applied to.

Returns

The enriched element.

_remove

_remove : function ()

Removes the current DOM element from the DOM.

_hide

_hide : function()

Lets you hide the current DOM element.  Therefore it sets the display and visibility of the element to not visible.

_show

_show : function()

Lets you show the current DOM element.  Therefore it sets the display and visibility of the element to visible.

_hasClass

_hasClass : function(clazz)

Checks if the current element has a given class set.  Return true if found, false otherwise.

Parameters

clazzThe name of the class to be checked.

Returns

True if found, false otherwise.

_addClass

_addClass : function(c)

Add the given class to the current element

Parameters

cThe name of the class to be set.

_attr

_attr : function(key)

Returns an attribute of an DOM element.  Which can be specified by the parameter.

Parameters

keyThe name of the attribute one want to have.

Returns

The value of the given attribute.  Otherwise null.

_inject

_inject : function(el)

Adds the current element as a child of a given element.

Parameters

elThe element the current element should be added.

_injectTop

_injectTop : function(el)

Adds the current element before the given element.

Parameters

elThe element the current element should be added.

_injectBefore

_injectBefore : function(el)

Adds the current element before the parent node of the current DOM element into the DOM.

Parameters

elThe element the current element should be added.

_injectAfter

_injectAfter : function(el)

Adds the current element after the parent node of the current DOM element into the DOM.

Parameters

elThe element the current element should be added.

KNOWWE.helper.selector

Selects and extends DOM elements.  Elements arrays returned with this function will also accept all the HTMLNode methods.  The selector can be an id, a HTML tag or a CSS class and HTML tag in combination.  The element can also be selected through an attribute node.  Have a look at the examples for the further possibilities.

Examples: (_KS = KNOWWE.helper.selector)

  • _KS( #id ) returns all elements with id=id
  • _KS( tag ) returns all elements with tag=tag
  • _KS( #id tag ) returns all elements with tag=tag within the element with id=id
  • _KS( tag .class ) returns an array with all elements that agree in tag and class properties
  • _KS(input[type=submit] returns all submit input elements
  • _KS(input[type] returns all input elements with the specified type attribute
  • _KS([type=submit] returns all elements with the given attribute

Parameters

selectorThe selector string used to determine the elements to search for
contextThe DOM element that should be used as entry for the element search.

Returns

The found DOM element(s)

KNOWWE.helper.hash

Representation of a map.  Stores data as key:value pairs.

Parameters

mapAn object of key:value pairs to initialize a map with (optional)
Summary
Functions
setAdds a key:value pair to the map.
containsChecks if the a value is already stored in the map.
getGets an value to the given key.
forEachApplies an function to every single element in the map.
keysReturns the keys of the current map.
sizeReturns the size of the map
removeRemoves an value from the map
toStringReturns an string containing all elements of the map aks key:value pair.

Functions

set

this.set = function(key,
value)

Adds a key:value pair to the map.  If the key already exists in the map it is overwritten and the old value is lost.

Parameters

keyThe key of the value
valueThe value to the key

contains

this.contains = function(key)

Checks if the a value is already stored in the map.  Returns TRUE if it is, otherwise FALSE.

Parameters

keyThe key to be checked.

Returns

TRUE if found, otherwise FALSE

get

this.get = function(key)

Gets an value to the given key.  If the key is not present in the map NULL is returned.

Parameters

keyThe key to which the value is requested.

Returns

The value to the key or NULL if not present.

forEach

this.forEach = function(fn)

Applies an function to every single element in the map.

Parameters

fnThe function to apply to the map key:value pairs.

keys

this.keys = function()

Returns the keys of the current map.

Returns

The keys of the map

size

this.size = function()

Returns the size of the map

Returns

The size of the map.

remove

this.remove = function(key)

Removes an value from the map

Parameters

keyThe key to be deleted.

toString

this.toString = function()

Returns an string containing all elements of the map aks key:value pair.

Returns

String representation of the map

KNOWWE.helper.logger

The KNOWWE logger.  Used to log cross browser messages and for debugging issues.  The logger is per default disabled.  If you want to use it, please set “inUse” to TRUE.  If the logger is enabled you will see a number in the top left corner of the page.

Summary
Variables
inUseSet to false if you want that the logger does not appear.
msgCountStores the numbers of displayed messages
Functions
setupInitializes the logger if it has not yet.
clearClears the logger messages.
errorLogs the given message to the overlay HTMLNode DIV container as a debug message.
infoLogs the given message to the overlay HTMLNode DIV container as a debug message.

Variables

inUse

var inUse

Set to false if you want that the logger does not appear.

Type

Boolean

msgCount

var msgCount

Stores the numbers of displayed messages

Type

Integer

Functions

setup

setup : function()

Initializes the logger if it has not yet.

clear

clear : function()

Clears the logger messages.  And resets the message counter to zero.

error

error : function(msg)

Logs the given message to the overlay HTMLNode DIV container as a debug message.

Parameters

msgThe message to display

info

info : function(msg)

Logs the given message to the overlay HTMLNode DIV container as a debug message.

Parameters

msgThe message to display

KNOWWE.helper.overlay

The overlay namespace.

Parameters

optionsAn options object with parameters for the overlay element.

Returns

The overlay element.

Summary
Variables
oDefaultContains the default options of the dialog.
Functions
initInitializes the overlay.

Variables

oDefault

var oDefault

Contains the default options of the dialog.

Type

Object

Functions

init

function init()

Initializes the overlay.  Therefore gets the data that should be displayed and wraps it into an HTMLElement.

KNOWWE.helper.window

The KNOWWE window object.  Used to handle pop-up windows.

Summary
Functions
openShows a pop-up window with the given parameter.
getWindowReturns the current window.

Functions

open

open : function(options)

Shows a pop-up window with the given parameter.

Parameters

optionsAn object containing the configuration of the window

getWindow

getWindow : function()

Returns the current window.

Returns

The instance of the pop-up

String.getBytes

Encodes this String into a sequence of bytes, storing the result into a new string encoded as a component of a URI.

Returns

The encoded String.

String.startsWith

Determines whether the beginning of an instance of String matches a specified string.

Parameters

strThe prefix used for checking

String.endsWith

Determines whether the end of an instance of String matches a specified string..

Parameters

strThe prefix used for checking

String.each

Iterates over an array and executes the given function for each element of the array.  Used to simply apply a function to all elements of an array.

This prototype is provided by the Mozilla foundation and is distributed under the MIT license.  http://www.ibiblio.org/pub/Linux/LICENSES/mit.license

Parameters

funThe called function.

oDefault)
